file(GLOB has_pythia6 pythia6*.f)
if(EXISTS ${has_pythia6})
  set(ENV{has_pythia6} ${has_pythia6})
  message(STATUS "Pythia6 found in ${has_pythia6}!")
else()
  message(STATUS "Pythia6 not found. Will proceed without it")
endif()
